game.name: Concerto on White
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Indie, Simulation, Early Access
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, In-App Purchases, Partial Controller Support, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Rhythm Action? No, this is MUSICIAN SIMULATION! Concerto on White is a musician simulation game featuring classical music. Unlike any typical rhythm games, players are required to actually play the main melody. In the main story, you will experience adventurous campus life in the academy.
